entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
